name: Dead Cargo
description:
You are a courier living in post-apocalyptic world full of zombies, and you need to deliver some cargo to a safe zone. But zombies don't sleep! So you need to fight back the zombies and try to not to die...

How to play: AD to move, mouse and left-click to shoot, 1, 2 to switch weapons, move your mouse up and down to atack with the sword.
